Most people charge at night, while they’re sleeping -- when electricity rates are often lower.", "questions"=>"How long does it take to charge an electric car or plug-in hybrid?"}, {"answer"=>"Even when they use coal-generated electricity, electric cars can cut emissions by 40%. In areas that use many clean energy sources, you can cut emissions by as much as 90%. If you power your car with clean power from the sun or through a clean energy program, you can drive with zero carbon emissions.
Plug-in hybrids don’t cut emissions as much, but they’re still cleaner than gas-powered cars.
Even regular hybrids produce about 30% less harmful emissions than comparable gas-powered cars. Some say this figure is even higher.", "questions"=>"How is driving an electric car or hybrid better than driving a gas-powered car?"}]}, {"header"=>"LED Bulbs", "questions"=>[{"answer"=>"LEDs, or light–emitting diodes, are semiconductors that produce light when an electric current passes through them. They’re more efficient than other bulbs, and they last much longer.", "questions"=>"What are LED bulbs?"}, {"answer"=>"LEDs are a lot cheaper than they used to be. Many of the best-selling LEDs go for around $10 now.", "questions"=>"How much do LEDs cost?"}, {"answer"=>"LEDs are more efficient, so you’ll spend less to power them. And they can last over 20 years, compared to one year for an old-style bulb -- so you won’t have to buy as many bulbs.", "questions"=>"How do I save with LEDs?"}, {"answer"=>"The latest LED bulbs rival the look, dimming ability, and light quality of old-style incandescents. A good-quality LED like the Cree will produce great lighting for your home. Some bulbs even let you control the color with your smartphone!", "questions"=>"Will my light quality be as good with LEDs?"}]}, {"header"=>"Smart Thermostats", "questions"=>[{"answer"=>"A smart thermostat can learn your preferences and adjust your home temperature to your lifestyle. It can automatically lower your heating or air conditioning when you’re away or asleep, and even adjust your energy consumption based on things like humidity and weather conditions.
Another great thing about a smart thermostat is that you have total control. You can even control most smart thermostats from a remote location using your laptop or mobile device.", "questions"=>"What is a smart thermostat?"}, {"answer"=>"A smart thermostat can run about $250. It can sometimes pay for itself in less than two years.", "questions"=>"How much do smart thermostats cost?"}, {"answer"=>"A smart thermostat learns your preferences and adjusts your home temperature to your lifestyle -- for instance, it can lower your heating and air conditioning when you’re not using them. That means you won’t be wasting power when you’re away or asleep. You can even control your thermostat remotely when you’re not home.
Savings can be significant. Several studies have shown that the Nest, one of the most popular smart thermostats, pays for itself in less than two years.", "questions"=>"How do I save with a smart thermostat?"}, {"answer"=>"For heating, try 68° - 70° F when you’re home, 53° F when you’re away, and 60° F while you’re asleep. For cooling, turn down your AC when you go out, and set it to 78° F or higher when you’re home.", "questions"=>"What are the ideal home temperatures?"}]}]

children.name: title
children.content: Here’s why customers love us…

children.name: header
children.content: ON YOUR SIDE

children.name: content
children.content: We’ll hustle for the best deals, but if solar or any other action doesn’t work for you, we’ll tell you.

children.name: header
children.content: NO PRESSURE

children.name: content
children.content: Our concierges are not salespeople and are not paid commissions.

children.name: header
children.content: FREE

children.name: content
children.content: Domino’s concierge service is 100% free for homeowners in the U.S.

children.name: header
children.content: MEET A CONCIERGE: DAN EATON

children.name: content
children.content: "        This is not just a job for me. I drive a beast of an electric car, my house is powered by the sun and my water heaters are tankless. And I’ll talk about this stuff all day if you don’t stop me."

children.name: header
children.content: Google doesn’t have all the answers.

children.name: content
children.content: No two homes, families or lifestyles are the same.  Domino gives you a FREE concierge who will find a clean energy + savings plan that works for YOU.

children.name: header
children.content:
100% clean energy is awesome.
Domino makes it easy.

children.name: subTitle
children.content:
From solar panels to smart thermostats and everything in between,
we’ve done the research and lined up deals so you don’t have to.

children.name: header
children.content: WE CALL YOU

children.name: content
children.content: Since no two homes, families and lifestyles are the same - our concierge will ask you a few questions to understand your needs.

children.name: header
children.content: WE FIND SAVINGS

children.name: content
children.content: Clean energy often means switching from a pricey to a cheap energy source. There are 100s of ways to do that, we’ll investigate what’s right for you.

children.name: header
children.content: WE GET IT DONE

children.name: content
children.content: We’ll recommend the best path to clean energy + savings. And we’ll stay with you from start to finish. At no cost to you.

children.name: header
children.content: We'll do the work. You'll do the saving.

children.name: title
children.content: Meet the Millers

children.name: description
children.content: Their power bills were through the roof.  Domino helped them get a great deal on solar. And then super-sized the savings with an electric car.

children.name: contactPhone
children.content:
510-454-8522
9am to 9pm ET, Monday-Friday

children.name: header1
children.content:
100% clean energy is awesome.
Domino makes it easy.

children.name: header2
children.content: We’re not salespeople, we’re energy wonks. We’re obsessed with clean energy actions that don’t compromise your lifestyle and put more cash back in your pocket.

We don’t mean to exaggerate, but this phone call could change the world.

children.name: emailTag
children.content: So we can find a convenient time. No spam, no ads.

children.name: addressTag
children.content: Helps us research your options before we talk.

children.name: emailLabel
children.content: Email

children.name: submitLabel
children.content: LET’S ROCK ‘N ROLL!

children.name: header
children.content: Choose One or More to See How Fossil-Fuel-Free You Can Go In

children.name: totalPre
children.content: You could save

children.name: totalPost
children.content: each year when you make these upgrades in

children.name: offsiteSolar
children.content: Get the financial and energy saving benefits of solar panels with none of the maintenance.

children.name: rooftopSolar
children.content: Zap your electric bill and boost your home’s value using only the sun. Join the 500,000 Americans who have already gone solar!

children.name: groundHeat
children.content: Heat & cool your home with just 1 cost-saving appliance! A geothermal heat pump is the greenest way to keep your home cozy all year long.

children.name: hybrid
children.content: With styles & options to suit your family (and your budget), hybrids are the no-compromise way to cut your fuel costs & emissions.

children.name: hybridElectric
children.content: Now that plug-in hybrids have bigger batteries & stronger motors than traditional hybrids, you’ll drive more and fill up less.

children.name: allElectric
children.content: Never stop at a gas station again! Electric cars are fun to drive, cost less to maintain, and produce no toxic emissions. Charge at night, drive all day.

children.name: upgrades
children.content: With energy savings up to 95% and a bulb that lasts 25x longer than a traditional bulb, LEDs offer huge convenience & cost savings.

children.name: thermostat
children.content: Smart thermostats not only save you money - they also keep you more comfortable. Plus, use your phone to adjust temps remotely, and keep the savings flowing.

children.name: airHeat
children.content: Enjoy comfort and energy savings - not to mention the money you can save - with an efficient, quiet electric heat pump. Your savings start right away.
